entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Slave Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:57 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -23.1°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm near the Swan Hills. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
